title: Inside Aer Lingus
overview: Covering day to day life within Ireland's favourite airline in a year which featured significant long haul expansion with ground-breaking new North American routes, staff upheavals and Dublin flyovers to celebrate the traditional kick-off to the US College Football season, it is set to feature all aspects from ground staff, baggage handlers, cabin crew and pilots as they plot the Shamrock's journey through another colourful year.
